This application was developed by Raymetrics S.A., within the framework of the Operational Program of the Region of Central Macedonia 2014-2020 "RESEARCH INNOVATION PROJECTS" with the project title " Development of a forecasting system and geographical indicators for the agriculture.", PSKE CODE: KMP6- 0078047.

Meteoray is an integrated agricultural information system based on operational weather forecasting with high spatial resolution (1km x1km), specifically adapted to the needs of the producer and to the climatic and topographical characteristics of the region, with an emphasis on conditions of frost and increased humidity. The system aims to aid the producers with specialized indicators, in making day-to-day decisions that are fundamentally affected by weather conditions such as crop growth/irrigation, fertilization, pest and disease control, and fieldwork capability. The application enables immediate information on the weather forecast and geographical indicators in locations of the user " s choice as well as the issuance of relevant warnings for the protection and optimization of production.
